> "I would have written a shorter letter, but I did not have the time." --- Blaise Pascal

![Image: Wikimedia](images/Blaise_Pascal_Versailles.JPG){width=6em}


Writing effectively is a key skill for psychologists. This theme covers the basics of academic writing, including how to structure essays, how to reference your work, and how to write in an academic style. We also cover how to use generative AI effectively and enhance your studies --- not only as a tool for writing, but also for learning and understanding complex ideas.
